name: Arjybeasts
description:
Hello Slave! Arjybeasts is a Rogue-Like and Turn Based RPG whereby you must select a pixel on your character each turn. The RGB values of this pixel then become your Stats for that turn.

Now delete all those files for me, I need a bit more space so I can install Rabid Dog Simulator 3. If you don't I'll destroy you forever. Bye!

 

Special Thanks To

Sam 

Beep Box

Alex
